intro: Become the best courier in the Universe!
description:
Deliver packages... in space! Test your agility by navigating through different galaxies carrying diverse packages. Upgrade your ship and hone your skills to beat challenges of deep space that await you!

FEATURES:
- progression through galaxy filled with 18 unique worlds
- various planets, obstacles and astronomical/physical phenomena
- 9 different package types that put unique twist on the current run
- unlockable perks, traits and upgrades that modify the gameplay or improve your ship
- physic based gameplay: (avoid) collisions with surroundings or galactic storms that exert forces on your ship
- deep damage system: the more damaged the engines the harder it is to manuver - better manage condition of your ship
- motivational awards system based on your achievements
- accessible bonus system based on collecting mail that increases your payout
